name: RC Drone X200
description: The RC Drone X200 is a high-performance remote-controlled drone equipped with a camera for aerial photography and video recording. It has a stable flight system, long battery life, and advanced features like altitude hold and headless mode.

name: Glider Plane Elite
description: The Glider Plane Elite is a classic foam glider that can soar through the air for long distances. It is easy to assemble and offers hours of outdoor flying fun for kids and adults alike.

name: Rocket Launcher Set
description: The Rocket Launcher Set is a thrilling toy that allows you to launch foam rockets into the sky. It comes with a launch pad, rockets, and a hand pump for easy launching.

name: Flying Disc Pro
description: The Flying Disc Pro is a high-quality frisbee that offers excellent flight stability and durability. It is perfect for outdoor play and can be enjoyed by both beginners and advanced players.

name: LED Light-Up Boomerang
description: The LED Light-Up Boomerang is a unique flying toy that features vibrant LED lights. It is designed to return to the thrower, making it an exciting and entertaining outdoor activity.

name: Kite Adventure Set
description: The Kite Adventure Set includes a colorful kite, string, and handles for hours of kite-flying fun. It is easy to assemble and suitable for all ages, making it a great outdoor activity for the whole family.

name: Stunt Quadcopter X400
description: The Stunt Quadcopter X400 is a versatile and agile remote-controlled quadcopter that can perform impressive aerial stunts. It has a durable construction, LED lights, and multiple flight modes for a thrilling flying experience.

name: Foam Glider Rocket
description: The Foam Glider Rocket is a foam airplane toy that can be launched by hand. It is designed for high-speed flights and acrobatic maneuvers, providing endless fun for outdoor play.

name: Helicopter Pilot Simulator
description: The Helicopter Pilot Simulator is a realistic flight simulator that allows you to experience the thrill of flying a helicopter. It features a joystick controller, adjustable settings, and immersive graphics for an authentic flying experience.

name: Sling Shot Foam Gliders
description: The Sling Shot Foam Gliders are lightweight foam airplanes that can be launched using a sling shot mechanism. They are easy to launch and provide hours of flying fun for children.
